S.FORM: 12 Irou ka ni-pahkou-fou-en tou maling ka assimæ'æum-vei-ryng-ah sa-likough ti Herodes-an, ni-tauqua tou pani ki d-'arang mou-qua tou pourough nein-ra.

13 Irou ka ni-ta'æu-kaha d'marang ta neini, k'yytey ta Tama-Gnau ki MEIRANG moupænæh tou maling ti Josef-an, mattæi-k'ma hynna; Æhpit-tâ'æuh-au ta Rauwei [pa-toug-par-'au] ta tu Ina tyn, illup't-tâ mou-qua tou Egypten, ka itou-qua-appa hynna ka vana-vana-ei maukow: ka k'ma-alato hynna ka kmi-ym-ah ta ti Herodes ki Rauwei, ki pakapatei-eih tyni-an.
14 Anna ta, teni rou ni-pa-patti-mæuag-hen ni-'mmara ki Rauwei lam ki Raren-'an tyn ka euvannæn, ka ni-d'marang fah-kaqua tou Egypten.
15 Ka ni-iton-qua hynna tou ni-kapatei-en ti Herodes: alei ka pa-væut-auh ta na sou ki MEIRANG pa-pattæi-tounoun ki Mattæi-tan, koun, nitæ-tem-au ta alak-au tou Egypten.
